title: For the Spam champs Reto
body:
Give us an option to silence the annoying sound that happens when you use an ability that is currently on CD. The only way to do it at the moment is to silence your in game audio For many champs this just destroys the beautiful game sounds you give us with  relentless high pitched error semi ping like noises.

Pls Rito

{{champion:32}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} !
